file_content.text: Go ahead. Kill them. Kill the Jedi.
You think I don't know what you're doing?
Of course I know. I know everything, sad little spy.
Of course I know. I know everything, simple little soldier.
Pathetic Jedi. Of course I know. I know everything.
Of course I know, my righteous Wrath. I know everything.
Of course I know, my fluttering little insect. I know everything.
Of course I know. I know everything, Captain.
My intellect is beyond you and every other Dark Council member combined. I know more than you could learn in a thousand lifetimes.
Of course I know, bounty hunter. I know everything.
And I will enjoy watching you fail.
If you let them live, they will just keep murdering in my name. Don't hesitate.
Kill them. I won't mind--and neither will your Republic friend.
Kill them. I won't mind--and neither will your dear ally.
[Shock them unconscious]
[Kill them]
[Kill them]
[Shock them unconscious]
Yes... good....
What are you doing? This is not the act of a proper Sith Lord....
You're a ruthless gun for hire. Do it. Kill them!
Hardly the action of a dedicated agent of the Empire, I should say....
The loyal Republic servant. So noble. So pathetic....
